item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: January 28, 2026 Today's Verse Proverbs 3:7â€“8 [7] Be not wise in your own eyes; fear the LORD, and turn away from evil. [8] It will be healing to your flesh and refreshment to your bones. This Year's Memory Verses Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth. He does not faint or grow weary; his understanding is unsearchable.
